languages.text: "Реквизирует!" {n}Абеляр на мгновение теряет дар речи.{/n} "Ваши формулировки, молодой человек, недостойны беседы с Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "Реквизирует!" {n}Абеляр на мгновение теряет дар речи.{/n} "Ваши формулировки, молодой человек, недостойны беседы с Вольным Торговцем".

languages.text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: "Реквизирует!" {n}Абеляр на мгновение теряет дар речи.{/n} "Ваши формулировки, молодой человек, недостойны беседы с Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of expressions is utterly unfit for talking to a Rogue Trader."
"Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of expressions is utterly unfit for talking to a Rogue Trader."
"Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"
"Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"
"Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: “征用！”{n}阿贝拉德一时不知该说什么好。{/n}“年轻人，你的用词实在是太不得体了，几乎相当于侮辱。你面前的人可是位行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: “征用！”{n}阿贝拉德一时不知该说什么好。{/n}“年轻人，你的用词实在是太不得体了，几乎相当于侮辱。你面前的人可是位行商浪人！”

languages.text: «¡Confiscar!». {n}Abelard se queda sin palabras durante unos momentos.{/n} «Joven, sus palabras son indecorosas y casi insultantes. ¡Está hablando con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Confiscar!». {n}Abelard se queda sin palabras durante unos momentos.{/n} «Joven, sus palabras son indecorosas y casi insultantes. ¡Está hablando con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: 「徴用ですと！」{n}アベラルドは一瞬言葉を失う。{/n}「青年、その言葉選びは侮蔑的でふさわしくありませんよ。あなたが話しているのは、かの自由開拓者なのです！」
languages.original_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: 「摘発だと！」{n}アベラルドは一瞬言葉を失う。{/n}「青年よ、その言葉選びは侮蔑的でふさわしくありませんな――自由開拓者と話をしているのですよ！」

languages.text: « Une réquisition ! » {n}Pendant quelques instants, Abélard reste sans voix.{/n} « Jeune homme, vos propos sont inconvenants et à la limite de l'insulte. Vous vous adressez à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: « Une réquisition ! » {n}Pendant quelques instants, Abélard reste sans voix.{/n} « Jeune homme, vos propos sont inconvenants et à la limite de l'insulte. Vous vous adressez à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: "Requirieren!" {n}Abelard ist für einen Moment sprachlos.{/n} "Junger Mann, Eure Wortwahl ist unangemessen und grenzt an Beleidigung – Ihr sprecht mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Requirieren!" {n}Abelard ist für einen Moment sprachlos.{/n} "Junger Mann, Eure Wortwahl ist unangemessen und grenzt an Beleidigung – Ihr sprecht mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}!"

languages.original_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: "El koymak mı?" {n}Abelard'ın bir an nutku tutuluyor.{/n} "Genç adam, kelime seçimleriniz hakarete varacak kadar yakışıksız. Karşınızda bir Hür Tacir var!"
languages.original_text: "Requisitioning!" {n}Abelard is left speechless for a moment.{/n} "Young man, your choice of words is unseemly to the point of insult — you are addressing a Rogue Trader!"
